content: **a crochet kitchen bowl cozy that is worked in row ** > **find a special code in the pattern post 1 to get the pattern for just $1 look for yellow background or use code get1off at checkout for $1 off a pattern purchase ** **size ** height 4 5 /11 5 cm circumference 16-18 /40 5-45 5 cm - work a different number of row to adjust the circumference **stitches & techniques used ** chains slip_stitch single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet working in the back loop only working simple short row **yarn ** 75 yards of #4 worsted weight lion brand 24/7 cotton or we crochet dishie or suitable substitute of 100% cotton yarn **tools ** us size g+/7 4 5 mm crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge yarn needle scissors stitch marker optional **other ** **read through all of the pattern notes before beginning** and please contact me if you ever have any questions about one of my patterns follow me on instagram @simplyhookedbyjanet join my facebook community and connect with other crochet enthusiasts https //www facebook com/groups/simplyhookedbyjanet copyright protected you may not redistribute pattern after purchase or publish any part as your own including photos you may sell finished products and if possible reference back to this pattern and/or give credit to simply hooked by janet as the original designer 1 https //www simplyhookedbyjanet com/simple-crochet-bowl-cozy-in-row/
